actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide for qualified withdrawals from the Capital Construction Fund (CCF) for fishermen leaving the industry and for the rollover of Capital Construction Funds to individual retirement plans.
short_title: Capital Construction Fund (CCF) Qualified Withdrawal Act of 2000

summary.text: Capital Construction Fund (CCF) Qualified Withdrawal Act of 2000 - Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1936 and the Internal Revenue Act to provide for qualified withdrawals from the Capital Construction Fund (CCF) for fishermen leaving the industry and for the rollover of CCF funds to individual retirement plans.

titles.title: Capital Construction Fund (CCF) Qualified Withdrawal Act of 2000

A bill to provide for qualified withdrawals from the Capital Construction Fund (CCF) for fishermen leaving the industry and for the rollover of Capital Construction Funds to individual retirement plans.
